class.name: ch.algotrader.entity.security.SecurityFamilyImpl
class.meta: Represents an entire family of similar {@link ch.algotrader.entity.security.Security Securities} (e.g. All Options of the SP500)

property.name: name
property.meta: The name of this SecurityFamily
true

property.name: symbolRoot
property.meta: The common part of Symbol (e.g. VIX for the VIX Future FVIX AUG/10 1000)

property.name: isinRoot
property.meta: The common part of the ISIN (e.g. VIX for the VIX Future 0FVIXFD00000). If no value is set the {@code baseSymbol} is taken.

property.name: ricRoot
property.meta: The common part of RIC (e.g. VX for the VIX Future VXQ1:VE). If no value is set the {@code baseSymbol} is taken.

property.name: currency
property.meta: The currency of the Securities of this SecurityFamily
ch.algotrader.enumeration.Currency

property.name: contractSize
property.meta: The contractSize of the Securities of this SecurityFamily (e.g. 100 for SPX Options).

property.name: scale
property.meta: The number of digits that prices of Securities of this SecurityFamily are quoted in.

property.name: tickSizePattern
property.meta:
A {@link java.text.ChoiceFormat} representing a pattern that defines the TickSize at different Price Levels.

For example the pattern "0<0.05 | 3<0.1" says, that the TickSize is 0.05 for prices from 0 to (but not including) 3 and 0.1 for prices above 3.

property.name: executionCommission
property.meta: The Execution Commission for one Contract of a Security of this SecurityFamily.

property.name: clearingCommission
property.meta: The Clearing Commission for one Contract of a Security of this SecurityFamily.

property.name: fee
property.meta: The Exchange Fee for one Contract of a Security of this SecurityFamily.

property.name: tradeable
property.meta: Represents a Security for which an order can be directly sent to the Market or via an OTC order

property.name: synthetic
property.meta: Represents virtual Securities that are only known to the Framework. Market Data needs to be calculated manually (e.g. a Combination)

property.name: periodicity
property.meta: Periodicity when Market Data is saved to the database (DAY, HOUR or MINUTE). Not valid for synthetic securities
ch.algotrader.enumeration.TimePeriod

property.name: maxGap
property.meta: The Maximum Market Data Gap (in minutes) that is expected in normal Market Conditions. An exception is thrown if no market data arrives for a period longer than this value which might indicate a problem with the external Market Data Provider.

many-to-one.name: underlying
many-to-one.meta: The base class of all Securities in the system

set.name: securities
set.meta: Represents an entire family of similar {@link ch.algotrader.entity.security.Security Securities} (e.g. All Options of the S&P500)

map.name: brokerParameters
map.meta: Represents an entire family of similar {@link ch.algotrader.entity.security.Security Securities} (e.g. All Options of the S&P500)

property.name: intrest
property.meta: The current Intrest relevant to the pricing of {@link Future Futures} of this FutureFamily.

property.name: dividend
property.meta: The current Dividend relevant to the pricing of {@link Future Futures} of this FutureFamily.

property.name: marginParameter
property.meta: The Margin Parameter used to calculate the Margin of a {@code Future} Contract of this FutureFamily.

property.name: expirationType
property.meta: The Type of Expiration Logic utilized by {@link Future Futures} of this FutureFamily.
ch.algotrader.enumeration.ExpirationType

property.name: expirationDistance
property.meta: The {@link Duration} between two {@link Future Futures} of this FutureFamily. (e.g. 3 Months for EUR.USD Forex Futures)
ch.algotrader.enumeration.Duration

property.name: length
property.meta: Represents the length of this Future Chain (i.e. how many Futures exist at one particular point in time)

property.name: intrest
property.meta: The current Intrest relevant to the pricing of {@link Option Options} of this OptionFamily.

property.name: dividend
property.meta: The current Dividend relevant to the pricing of {@link Option Options} of this OptionFamily.

property.name: marginParameter
property.meta: The Margin Parameter used to calculate the Margin of a {@code Option} Contract of this OptionFamily.

property.name: expirationType
property.meta: The Type of Expiration Logic utilized by {@link Option Options} of this OptionFamily.
ch.algotrader.enumeration.ExpirationType

property.name: expirationDistance
property.meta: The {@link Duration} between two {@link Option Options} of this OptionFamily. (e.g. 1 Month for VIX Options)
ch.algotrader.enumeration.Duration

property.name: strikeDistance
property.meta: The distance between two strikes of {@link Option Options} of this OptionFamily.

property.name: weekly
property.meta: marks a weekly option series as opposed to a monthly option series

property.name: expirationType
property.meta: The Type of Expiration Logic utilized by {@link GenericFuture GenericFutures} of this GenericFutureFamily.
ch.algotrader.enumeration.ExpirationType

property.name: expirationDistance
property.meta: The {@link Duration} between two {@link GenericFuture GenericFutures} of this GenericFutureFamily. (e.g. 1 Month for UX)
ch.algotrader.enumeration.Duration

property.name: maturityDistance
property.meta: The {@link Duration} between two {@link Bond Bonds} of this BondFamily. (e.g. 3 Months)
ch.algotrader.enumeration.Duration

property.name: length
property.meta: Represents the length of this Bond Chain (i.e. how many Bonds exist at one particular point in time)

property.name: quotationStyle
property.meta: The type of quotes received for this BondFamily
ch.algotrader.enumeration.QuotationStyle
